Name: Tomboy Adventure
About the game: Ever wanted to escape into a virtual world? Now is your chance! Finding yourself on a secluded island, a wonderful summer awaits you. Beside you is your girl-friend, Natsumi! You have known her for a long time but your relationship never moved past 'friends'. This might be your last summer together. If you want to make your feelings known, now is your chance! Features Tomboy Adventure is an interaction driven dating sim where through your choices you unsuccessfully try to romance your companion. Exploring the island unlocks new dialogue options and interactions, creating new opportunities for getting your feelings across. Branching dialogue Headpatting Explorable island Fishing Day/night cycle Dynamic weather Camping Advanced headpatting The summer is short so lets enjoy it! Both VR and non-VR play is supported!
